name: Cream Cheese Won Tons
author: Stacee
summary: This is the only way I will eat cream cheese. I thought I would try it, because I love won tons and the kids love cream cheese.  Try it, it's onolicious! I usually use a little bit of beaten egg to seal the won ton skins into their package shape.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package small won ton wrappers
directions: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, clams, green onions, water chestnuts, paprika and ground black pepper
Place about 1 teaspoon of filling into the won ton skin and seal corner to corner forming a triangle
In a large skillet, heat oil to a high temperature
Fry the won tons until they are browned on both sides
Drain on paper towels and serve hot
